fullDescription.intro: This layer applies multiplicative one-centered gaussian noise to the layer input. Corresponds to the Keras Gaussian Dropout Layer.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The name prefix of the layer. The prefix is complemented by an index suffix to obtain a unique layer name. If this option is unchecked, the name prefix is derived from the layer type.
The drop probability (as with Dropout). The multiplicative noise will have standard deviation sqrt(rate / (1 - rate)).

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add a Gaussian Dropout layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Gaussian Dropout layer.
